title: PlayStation Studio is Making Their Biggest Game Yet - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.16.22
description:
Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to get a free 14-day trial.

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Blessing and Tim talk about big changes happening at Team Asobi, Dragon Ball officially coming to Fortnite, and Rollerdrome review impressions.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
FargoBrady, GuyVee, & The Sabateur
The Roper Report   -
00:04:25 - Team Asobi’s next game is their biggest yet - Liam Croft @ PushSquare
00:24:15 - Speaking of PlayStation: We got more proof of a PlayStation PC Launcher - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:29:30 -  Ad
00:31:33 -  Rollerdrome Review Round Up
00:37:30 - Dragon Ball is officially in Fortnite! - Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:41:55 - We got more Multiversus leaks - Owen S. Good @ Polygon
00:48:02 - They gave a squirrel a gun - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:50:36 - Wave Race is coming to Nintendo Switch Online - Twitter
00:52:30 - Out today
00:57:26 - Required Reading: Nintendo Of America's Testers Say They Faced Years Of Sexual Harassment - Sisi Jiang @ Kotaku
https://kotaku.com/nintendo-of-america-sexual-harassment-sexism-aerotek-1849414921
00:57:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Bless & Whitta
